p:
The melting curve analysis was performed to verify the sensitivity and specificity of primers. After the real-time PCR finished, Ct number was extracted for both actin gene and NPR1 gene with auto baseline and manual threshold. The relative expression of NPR1 gene and actin gene were calculated according to the 2 −ΔCt method provided by Schmittgen & Livak (2008). Δ Ct = Ct
NPR1 − Ct actin.
